11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"I would see the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) praying two rak'ahs of Fajr and making them so brief that I said: 'Did he recite the Umm Al-Kitab in them?

chapter.eng-name: Making the two rak'ahs of Fajr brief
